ygData.subject: Re: GZ answers
ygData.msgSnippet: To answer someone s question, if Pixie Strike has a base 33% chance of being resisted, and an immediate 33% chance of a secondary resist, then it in effect has
ygData.messageBody:
To answer someone's question, if Pixie Strike has a base 33%
chance of being resisted, and an immediate 33% chance of a
secondary resist, then it in effect has a 55% chance of being
resisted (45% chance of succeeding).

If it's working the way I suspect it is (base resist check,
level-based resist check, and immediate break-out resist
check), at 33% chance to resist across the board, you only
have a 30% chance of getting it to stick.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
